column7: Nature and scope of projects to be determined through consultation between student and faculty advisor; open to architecture and landscape architecture majors as well as those from other disciplines who wish to engage in interdisciplinary work. 0 to 8 graduate hours. No professional credit. Approved for Letter and S/U grading. May be repeated by MArch students in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 12 hours. PhD students may repeat in the same term to a maximum of 12 hours or in separate terms up to 18 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
